txt.en: Return to Ashnân in Burukíri and inform him that you have planted the crop seeds for him.
Gather bags of seeds to help Ashnân plant extra crops in Burukíri.
Plant the seeds in the locations at which the soil has already been tilled around Burukíri.
With news of the assaults led by Bârshud II, Ashnân wants to plant extra crops to ensure they have the supplies needed for their troops.

'[placeholder], you must have heard of the assaults that Bârshud II is leading in Ambarûl. I am not much of a fighter, but I want to do what I can to help the ones who are.\n\n'The fighters will need food, and while we have much here already I know we will need more. If you are willing, would you take these bags of seeds and plant them in the soil nearby, so that I can begin growing extra crops? You should be able to easily spot locations where the soil has been tilled already.'
'Thank you my friend. I hope these crops will be enough to sustain our fighters, but it is the best I can do for now. Please accept this as a token of my gratitude for your help.'
